item.title: [DELTA] Basic Commands[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

I’ll post here so people who search can find it.

Unban code: (Easily modified to make unip mute etc.)

[code=java] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“unban”) && playerRights > 2) {
try {
String victim = command.substring(5);
BufferedReader in = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(“config//bans.txt”));
BufferedWriter out = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter(“config//bans.txt”));
String unban = command.substring(6);
String inFile;

                while ((inFile = in.readLine()) != null) {
                    if (inFile.equalsIgnoreCase(unban)) {// Leave this blank we dont want it to write a file.
                    } else {
                        out.write(inFile); 
                    }

                }
            } catch (IOException e) {
                e.printStackTrace();
        	}	
        }[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] Basic Commands[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @P_A_N_I_C P A N I C
item.description:
@P_A_N_I_C wrote:

givemod:

else if(command.startsWith("givemod") && (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE!"))) { String name = command.substring(8); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 1; yell(name+" is now a Moderator"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Giveowner:

else if(command.startsWith("giveowner") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE!")) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 3; yell(name+" is now a co-owner"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

givehidden:

if(command.startsWith("givehidden") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE!")) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 4; //yell(name+" Is a ......."); why would u want to tell every1 u gave them RANK Demise?? LOL } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

Giveadmin:

if(command.startsWith("giveadmin") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE!")) { String name = command.substring(10); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 2; yell(name+" is now an Administrator"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

demote:

if(command.startsWith("demote") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("YOUR NAME HERE")) { String name = command.substring(7); try { int p = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name); client c = (client) server.playerHandler.players[p]; c.playerRights = 0; yell(name+" is no longer a member of staff"); } catch(Exception e) { sM(name+" either isn't online or doesn't exist"); } }

item.title: [DELTA] Basic Commands[DELTA]
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Sure, but they aren’t hard to code. Give me a minute. If you don’t understand them ask.

EDIT:

I’ll post them as I get them…

IPBAN:

[code=java] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“ipban”) && playerRights > 1) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(6);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

                if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                    client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

		p.writeLog(p.playerLastConnect, "ipbans");
		p.disconnected = true;
		sM("You have ipbanned "+p.playerName+"!");
                } else { 
                   sM("The name doesnt exist."); 
                }
            } catch (Exception e) { 
                sM("Try entering a name you want to ip ban..");
            }
        }[/code]

Sorry, I got caught up in something. Still need the other two? (I’ll have to either write them or do a search as I don’t have them.)

Read full topic
